Agreed_Complaints: Inability to edit verified personal information
Why_Users_Agree: These issues are recurring and affect multiple users, indicating systemic problems.
Recommended_Actions: Implement a robust edit function for verified personal information to avoid misspellings and user frustration.

Agreed_Complaints: App bugginess and slow loading times
Why_Users_Agree: Users express frustration with wasted time and effort due to unresolved bugs.
Recommended_Actions: Conduct thorough debugging and optimize the app to reduce loading times and crashes.

Agreed_Complaints: App crashes and persistent loading issues
Why_Users_Agree: The slow performance and crashing make the app unusable, leading to dissatisfaction.
Recommended_Actions: Address performance issues, particularly those causing the app to function poorly on various devices and networks.
Reconsider pricing strategy to maintain affordability and competitiveness in the market.
Prioritize user feedback in updates to ensure resolved issues and improved user experience.
